response.overview: Missed Opportunities is a powerful faith-based drama starring Dean Cain, Eddie McClintock, and Tim Ross that explores how often we overlook the moments God gives us to believe. Through a moving series of interconnected stories, one man’s spiritual journey reveals how the average person hears the Gospel 76 times before accepting Christ — and how grace keeps calling even when we don’t listen. When he buys a struggling youth camp, his mission becomes clear: to make sure no one misses their opportunity to know Jesus.
response.tagline: Seventy-Six chances to say Yes to Jesus
response.title: Missed Opportunities
